content: crochet a special boho boss bag a fun and easy to crochet bag this detailed tutorial pattern covers everything you need to know to crochet this gorgeous boho boss bag ***please note that this pattern is available for free on my blog www crochet365knittoo com the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy to read printable and ad-free version of the pattern with larger easy to reference photos*** materials needed - worsted weight yarn exact brand and color provided - crochet hook size g - purchased purse handles source given - tapestry needle for weaving in ends - optional fabric for lining the finished bag is 17 5 wide by 14 5 tall 22 tall including handles pattern is written in english using standard american terms level intermediate/advanced
